source.title: Taco Bell tries to woo younger customers with Live Más Café's flashy beverages - CNBC
source.name: CNBC

facts: Taco Bell is expanding its Live Más Cafés
Live Más Cafés are flashy beverages offered by Taco Bell
The expansion includes locations in Southern California, Dallas and Houston
Projected to have 30 Live Más Cafés across these regions by the end of the year

neutral.headline: Taco Bell Expands with Projected Addition of 30 Live Más Cafés in Key Markets
neutral.body_html: As part of its ongoing efforts to appeal to younger customers, Taco Bell is set to expand the number of Live Más Cafés across Southern California, Dallas and Houston. The fast-food chain projects it will have 30 such establishments by year's end.

conservative.headline: Taco Bell Plans to Open More Stores with Live Más Cafés
conservative.body_html: In an effort to attract a younger demographic, Taco Bell is planning to open more stores featuring the chain's signature flashy beverages known as Live Más Cafés. The expansion will take place in Southern California, Dallas and Houston with 30 new locations expected by year-end.

liberal.headline: Taco Bell Invests in Flashy Beverages to Attract Younger Customers
liberal.body_html: In a bold move, Taco Bell is investing heavily into its Live Más Cafés—a line of flashy beverages designed specifically for younger customers. The fast-food chain plans on having 30 such cafés across Southern California, Dallas and Houston by the end of this year.
